snippet: With the Olympics gone, the channel is making changes to get more traction in the ratings.
abstract: NBC Sports Network, with the Olympics gone, is making changes to get more traction in the ratings; most of its new additions are studio shows and not the live-action sports it so desperately needs; there remain enormous gaps in its schedule, and no defining personalities among its regular hosts and game announcers.
lead_paragraph: With the Olympics gone, the channel is making changes to get more traction in the ratings.

headline.seo: The NBC Sports Network Gets an Olympics Assist
headline.main: The NBC Sports Network Hopes Ratings Will Rise
headline.print_headline: The NBC Sports Network, With an Olympics Assist, Hopes Ratings Will Rise
